titleStmt.title: A psalme of thanks-giving, to be sung by the children of Christs Hospitall, on Munday in the Easter Holy dayes, at Christ Church, for their founders and benefactors. An. Dom. 1643.
titleStmt.author: Christ's Hospital (London, England)

notesStmt.note: Verse (Chorus): "Ise orphanes, raise your voyce in praise of God, for patrones kind ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
